item.title: Graphs 1
item.description: Why we use graphs Graphs help us model a specific type of data that has some dependency and relationships. Eg. Facebook friends data, Routes between cities and places (models the connectivity and distance) , Networking (connectivity), Pre-requisite of courses (knowledge and dependency), File Systems, Resource Allocation in OS (handling deadlocks). Representation of Graphs Represented as a Nodes and edges. Nodes : data while edge represents relationships. Most Simplest implementation is adjacency matrix but its not memory efficient for sparse graphs.
